00055     public function SaveVariables ( Variables $variables )
00056         {               
00057                 foreach ( $variables as $variable )
00058                 {
00059                         if ( $variable->IsValid() )
00060                         {
00061                                 if ( $this->IdVariableExists ( $variable->GetProperty( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDVARIABLE ) ) )
00062                                 {
00063                                         if ( ( $errs = $this->UpdateVariable( $variable )) InstanceOf Errors )
00064                                         {
00065                                                 return $errs;
00066                                         }
00067                                 }

00070                                         if ( ( $errs = $this->InsertVariable( $variable) ) InstanceOf Errors )
00071                                         {
00072                                                 return $errs;
00073                                         }
00074                                 }
00075                         }
00076                 }

00180         {
00181                 if ( ! $new->isValid( ) )
00182                 {
00183                         $errors = new Errors ( );
00184                         $errors->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::RECORD_NOT_VALID, 'Enregistrement de Variable non validé, merci de le valider avant de lancer une mise à jour') ) ;
00185                         
00186                         return $errors;
00187                 }

00190                 $clauses = MySQLTable::MYSQL_CLAUSE_WHERE . TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDVARIABLE . MySQLTable::MYSQL_SEEK_STRICT . intval( $new->GetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDVARIABLE ) );

00193                 {

00196                                 
00197                         return $errors;
00198                 }
00199

00228         public function IdVariableExists ( $idVariable )
00229         {
00230                 $clauses = MySQLTable::MYSQL_CLAUSE_WHERE . TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDVARIABLE . MySQLTABLE::MYSQL_SEEK_SEPARATOR . MySQLTable::MYSQL_SEEK_STRICT . intval( $idVariable ) . MySQLTABLE::MYSQL_SEEK_SEPARATOR;
00231                 
00232                 $res = $this->Select( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_IDVARIABLE, $clauses);
00233 
00234                 return (! ($res InstanceOf Errors || $res->GetCount() == 0 ) );
00235         } //---- End of IdVariableExists
